name: Tomash Hakatar
description:
Get your Train on!

Short casual game where you play a train.

Also the music is really cool and integrated with gameplay!

Made with Unity in a few days An entry for MatrixJam 2020!

Credits:

Ariel Bluman: Art & Animation

Jonathan Levin: Programming & Thomasss

Evelyn Genis: Music & Level design

Gal Azulay: Sound & Level design

Tamar Eitan: Animation

Gilad Shtruzman: Programming
